name: DeadlocksStackingForPyanadon
title: Deadlock's Stacking for Pyanodon
author: The_Ghost
description: Adds stacking (5x compression) for intermediate products introduced in Pyanodons Coal Processing, Pyanodons Fusion Energy, Pyanodons HighTech, Pyanodons Raw Ores, Py Petroleum Handling, Pyanodons Industry and Pyanodons Alien Life.
